trans-unit.source: This many hours of work have not yet been assigned to a person responsible.

seg-source.mrk: This many hours of work have not yet been assigned to a person responsible.

target.mrk: 此類工作時數尚未指派給負責人。

trans-unit.source: This card shows you how many hours of work in your work centers have not yet been assigned to a person responsible. The work is displayed based on the priority of the corresponding order operations.

seg-source.mrk: This card shows you how many hours of work in your work centers have not yet been assigned to a person responsible.
The work is displayed based on the priority of the corresponding order operations.

target.mrk: 此卡片顯示您工作中心有多少工作時數尚未指派給負責人。
工作會根據對應訂單作業的優先順序顯示。

trans-unit.source: Click this card to open the <uicontrol>Assign Maintenance Order Operations</uicontrol> app for order operations in your work centers whose planned dates overlap with the next 2 weeks.

seg-source.mrk: Click this card to open the <uicontrol>Assign Maintenance Order Operations</uicontrol> app for order operations in your work centers whose planned dates overlap with the next 2 weeks.

target.mrk: 按一下此卡片開啟 <uicontrol>[指派維護單作業]</uicontrol> 應用程式，取得計劃日期與未來兩週重疊的工作中心訂單作業。

trans-unit.source: The display time period starts today and continues until Sunday, the last day of the next calendar week. This means that if today is not the start of a calendar week, the actual display time period is shorter than two calendar weeks.

seg-source.mrk: The display time period starts today and continues until Sunday, the last day of the next calendar week.
This means that if today is not the start of a calendar week, the actual display time period is shorter than two calendar weeks.

target.mrk: 顯示期間於今日開始並持續至星期日 (下個曆週的最後一天)。
這表示若今日不是曆週開始，則實際顯示期間會少於兩個曆週。
